forMinor.checkboxLabel: %cbName% has obtained consent from a parent/guardian for this data about this child to be processed by Twine.
forMinor.explainerContent: Children below the age of 13 cannot form legal contracts, and thus cannot consent to our privacy policy. A parent or guardian must give consent for you to store their data, and for us to process it on your behalf.

forAdult.checkboxLabel: I am at least 13 years old
